name: manliness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the qualities or appearance thought to be typical of a man: My wife has never complained about my manliness. The emotionally complex male figures in movies created a new model of manliness. Synonyms
masculinity
virility (MAN) approvingSee
manly
More examplesFewer examplesHe had a deep sense of inferiority and seemed to question his own manliness. As a way of showing manliness, he deliberately made himself sound clipped and tough.At first he had doubts about the manliness of reciting poetry before a crowd.
